field.name: family
field.title: Family
field.description: Please refer to the R documentation

field.name: subset
field.title: Subset
field.description: Optional vector that may be used to specify a subset of the data. Please specify a column included in the data model.

field.name: weights
field.title: Weights
field.description: Optional vector that may be used to specify weights. Please specify a column included in the data model.

field.name: start
field.title: Start
field.description: Optional vector that may be used to specify start. Please specify a column included in the data model.

field.name: eta_start
field.title: ETA start
field.description: Optional vector that may be used to specify ETA start. Please specify a column included in the data model.

field.name: mu_start
field.title: Mu start
field.description: Optional vector that may be used to specify Mu start. Please specify a column included in the data model.

field.name: offset
field.title: Offset
field.description: Optional vector. Please specify a column included in the data model.

field.name: include_intercept
field.title: Include intercept in the null model

field.name: other_args
field.title: Other args
field.description: This field enables an expert user to specify arguments that can be passed to lower level regression functions.
